alert.note: Alert for Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 3:52PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Herkimer County through 415 PM EDT... At 352 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Ohio, or 16 miles north of Little Falls, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause ponding on roadways. Locations impacted include... Norway, Old City, Bull Hill, Gray, Paper Mill Corners, Black Creek Reservoir, Curtis, Wood Corners, Salisbury Center, Fairview Corners and Ives Hollow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
